cheeseMoon.name: Cheese from the Moon
cheeseMoon.desc: Everybody knows the Moon is made of the finest Cheese.

teleportChokolate.name: Teleport Chocolate
teleportChokolate.desc: Different flavors available! Directly from the screen into your Mouth!

lasagne.name: Lasagne
lasagne.desc: I’ve never met a Lasagna yet, I didn’t like.

strategema.name: Strategema
strategema.desc: Try and beat Data in the hardest Strategy-game of the Galaxy!

dunshire.name: Cones of Dunshire
dunshire.desc: It involves an elaborate series of rules and playable characters. The goal is rather unclear.

3dChess.name: 3D-Chess
3dChess.desc: It’s like chess, but 3D. Go ask Sheldon about it.

tardis.name: Tardis
tardis.desc: It looks like a Phone Box, but it’s bigger on the inside.

deLorean.name: DeLorean
deLorean.desc: Like a normal car, but capable of time-traveling. Buy now and get a Hoverboard for free!

voyager.name: USS Voyager
voyager.desc: For Sale! If you actually want the Enterprise, but can’t afford it.

ring.name: The Ring
ring.desc: No need for further description. Actually you can’t buy it. It finds you!
